scripts.dev: node scripts/copy-branding.mjs && node scripts/generate-icons.mjs && node scripts/generate-favicon.mjs && node scripts/dev-detect-api.mjs && vite
scripts.prebuild: node scripts/copy-branding.mjs && node scripts/generate-icons.mjs && node scripts/generate-favicon.mjs
scripts.smoke:start:stack: concurrently -k -s first -n api,web -c blue,green "cross-env PORT=4010 node server/server.js" "npx serve -s dist -l 5173"
scripts.smoke:run:combined: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 playwright test e2e/smoke.spec.ts e2e/partner-dashboard.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.smoke:all:combined: npm run smoke:build && start-server-and-test "npm run smoke:start:stack" http://localhost:4010/health "npm run smoke:run:combined"
scripts.mobile:run:se: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 playwright test e2e/mobile-home.spec.ts e2e/nav_mobile.spec.ts --project="Mobile Chrome (iPhone SE)"
scripts.mobile:run:iphone12: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 playwright test e2e/mobile-home.spec.ts e2e/nav_mobile.spec.ts --project="Mobile Chrome (iPhone 12)"
scripts.mobile:run:galaxys5: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 playwright test e2e/mobile-home.spec.ts e2e/nav_mobile.spec.ts --project="Mobile Chrome (Galaxy S5)"
scripts.mobile:run:all: npm run mobile:run:se && npm run mobile:run:iphone12 && npm run mobile:run:galaxys5
scripts.mobile:all: npm run smoke:build && start-server-and-test "npm run smoke:start:stack" http://localhost:4010/health "npm run mobile:run:all"
scripts.smoke:all: npm run smoke:build && start-server-and-test "npm run smoke:start:stack" http://localhost:4010/health "npm run smoke:run"
scripts.smoke:partner:all: npm run smoke:build && start-server-and-test "npm run smoke:start:stack" http://localhost:4010/health "npm run smoke:partner"
scripts.security:check: npm run security:scan && npm run security:audit
